New Records: Rohit Sharma scored the fastest century by an Indian at an ODI World Cup in 63 balls
Rohit Sharma surpassed Sachin Tendulkar for the most hundreds at the ODI World Cup
Key Match Events: Ishan Kishan's dismissal by Rashid Khan
Hardik Pandya's wicket of Azmatullah Omarzai
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma's comments on breaking records
Virat Kohli's reflections on the team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: India won by 8 wickets with 90 balls remaining
Afghanistan's total of 272/8 was below par
Others: India made light work of a chase of 273
Afghanistan's best passage of play was a 121-run partnership between Hashmatullah Shahidi and Azmatullah Omarzai
